abilities.description: Gear 3 version of Gomu Gomu no Bazooka. Luffy inflates both arms by biting both thumbs and delivers a devastating double-palm strike with enormous power, capable of breaking a giant's spine.

firstUse.outcome: Successfully defeated Oars by shattering his spine

keyMoments.description: Luffy uses Gomu Gomu no Gigant Bazooka to defeat Oars
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the devastating power of Gear 3 techniques in a critical battle

abilities.description: Moria's ultimate technique where he absorbs all shadows in the vicinity into his own body. In this instance, he absorbed 1,000 shadows from all zombies on Thriller Bark, dramatically increasing his size and power to rival Oars, though causing grotesque physical transformation with short spindly legs, gigantic arms, and a huge bloated neck pulsating with veins.

firstUse.outcome: Successfully absorbed 1,000 shadows and transformed into a massive monster

keyMoments.description: Moria activates Shadows Asgard and absorbs 1,000 shadows
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Moria's ultimate technique and trump card, representing a 10x power increase over Nightmare Luffy

keyMoments.description: Moria transforms into a grotesque giant form
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the terrifying potential of the Kage Kage no Mi when pushed to its absolute limits

reveals.information: Can absorb up to 1,000 shadows at once through Shadows Asgard
Absorbing massive amounts of shadows causes grotesque physical transformation and enormous size increase

abilities.description: Robin sprouts multiple legs on chosen objects or surfaces, allowing her to create footholds, lift people, or elevate objects several meters higher.

firstUse.outcome: Successfully created footholds for Brook to carry Luffy to the top

keyMoments.description: Robin uses Pierna Fleur to create footholds on the tower
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin's versatile tactical use of her Devil Fruit in team coordination
